title: Pixel 3/3XL eSIM support in Australia
content:
Hello
 I was just wondering if you can start looking into supporting the Pixel 3 / Pixel 3 XL for eSIM compatibility in Australia. Specifically the major telcos like Optus/Telstra/Vodafone
 There is no reason why Google cannot support eSIM as iPhones already have been working with eSIM at the moment with Optus etc.
 Thanks
category: Connectivity, Network, Bluetooth, Google Pixel 3 XL
